base.helpers:
def truncate_str(s: str, max_length: int) -> str:
    return s if len(s) <= max_length else s[:max_length - 1] + '…'


def fq_type(o) -> str:
    klass = getattr(o, '__class__', '')
    module = getattr(klass, '__module__', '')
    qname = getattr(klass, '__qualname__', '')
    return f'{module}.{qname}'
